### Infant Care
![](images/orange-infant-room.jpg)

Whether eating, playing, sleeping or simply fiddling around, your child is never left unattended. Trained and compassionate nurses work tirelessly towards creating a warm and tender atmosphere for your baby.
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-3}
### Pre-Toddler
![](images/orange-pre-toddler.jpg)

Our contemporary classrooms are thoughtfully designed to meet the needs of pre-toddlers. An enriching daily schedule encourages curiosity with engaging activities like storytelling, puppet shows, indoor and outdoor play, dance and music.
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-3}
### Kindergarten
![](images/orange-kinder-garden.jpg)

Our Multiple Intelligence based curriculum gives your child autonomy, helps kids learn by using 8 different senses and skills. We lay a strong foundation for lifetime of learning and discovery.
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-3}
### Day Care
![](images/orange-day-care.jpeg)

Our daycare is your child's second home! We offer you peace of mind. We help children socialize, finish their home work or spend time in extra curricular activities.
:::
